channel.title: Client Closes PLEASE HELP!
channel.description: Hello, i really need help. when my friend goes on my server and clicks twice anywhere on it it closes or crashes hes got a Windows 7, Acier (C:), hes got Program Files and Program Files (x86) I installed the lastest JDK (JDK1.6.0_20) i got that as well but it still crashes. It dosent happen to other people. It closes and comes a message on the CMD and closes i couldent copy it :/ This is in his Construct.bat (run.bat)..... same thing. i tried to do run.bat happaned to. anyways this is in the construct.bat: [code]@echo off title SemiScape Client java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui[/code]

item.title: Client Closes PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Clert Clert
item.description:
@Clert wrote:

[quote=“Czar y2k, post:2, topic:340228”]i think that ode was made for a 32bit computer, his computer with windows 7 is probally 64bit. download a .bat to .exe convertor, and convert the run.bat to run.exe, should work then.[/quote]OMFG THANK YOU SO MUCH!!! :D!!! MAN I <3 U!

Read full topic

item.title: Client Closes PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Czar_y2k Czar y2k
item.description:
@Czar_y2k wrote:

i think that ode was made for a 32bit computer, his computer with windows 7 is probally 64bit. download a .bat to .exe convertor, and convert the run.bat to run.exe, should work then.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Closes PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Clert Clert
item.description:
@Clert wrote:

Hello, i really need help.
when my friend goes on my server and clicks twice anywhere on it it closes or crashes
hes got a Windows 7, Acier (C:), hes got Program Files and Program Files (x86)
I installed the lastest JDK (JDK1.6.0_20) i got that as well but it still crashes.
It dosent happen to other people.
It closes and comes a message on the CMD and closes i couldent copy it
This is in his Construct.bat (run.bat)… same thing. i tried to do run.bat happaned to. anyways this is in the construct.bat:

@echo off title SemiScape Client java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

Read full topic
